title: Mumbai students maps ancient ‘Baravs’ across Marathwada for conservation
description: Mumbai students document Marathwada's historic stepwells

title: Art and Culture with Devdutt Pattanaik | How metaphors reveal ancient India’s cultural secrets
description: Explore how metaphors in early Indian poetry reflect the relationship between nature and emotion. From Vedic to Tamil and Deccan traditions, discover how geography shapes diverse poetic expressions and deepens our understanding of life and love.

title: Ancient Brijuni burial site reveals 3,000 years of human presence
description: Archaeological research at Vrh Kosir (Rankun) on Veli Brijun, part of Croatia’s Brijuni National Park, has been successfully completed, uncovering...The post Ancient Brijuni burial site reveals 3,000 years of human presence first appeared on Croatia Week.

title: The DNA Of Jerusalem: Ancient Pilgrimage Road Opens To The World
description: In a historic milestone for archaeology and faith, the newly opened Pilgrimage Road at the City of David is welcoming visitors for the first time in nearly 2,000 years. This monumental 600-meter thoroughfare, once the spiritual and commercial heart of Second Temple Jerusalem, has been painstakingly uncovered stone by stone. As of January 2026, the ...

title: Lost ancient Greek star catalog decoded by particle accelerator
description: Synchrotron radiation has revealed a star map made by the ancient astronomer Hipparchus that was thought to be lost to time
